pattern: XOR with constant followed by table comparison
takeaway: If binary xors input with constant and compares against numeric table, recover flag by inverting operations.
jumpjump (1000b,349.43p,36s) 描述 ' goto ' anywhere.  plz  use d3 ctf{ } to wrap the answer before submitting.  Flag Format: d3ctf{ this_is_a_sample_flag }
